mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exchange ( exchangeNm, userNm, amount, state, applied_at, processed_at ) VALUES ( #{exchangeNm}, #{userNm}, #{amount}, #{state,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{appliedAt}, #{processedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE exchange SET userNm = #{userNm}, amount = #{amount}, state = #{state,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, applied_at = #{appliedAt}, processed_at = #{processedAt} WHERE exchangeNm = #{exchangeNm}
mapper.select: SELECT exchangeNm, userNm, amount, state, applied_at, processed_at FROM exchange WHERE exchangeNm = #{exchangeNm}
SELECT exchangeNm, userNm, amount, state, applied_at, processed_at FROM exchange WHERE userNm = #{userNm} ORDER BY applied_at DESC
SELECT exchangeNm, userNm, amount, state, applied_at, processed_at FROM exchange ORDER BY applied_at DESC
SELECT exchangeNm, userNm, amount, state, applied_at, processed_at FROM exchange WHERE state = #{state,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler} ORDER BY applied_at DESC

SELECT exchangeNm, userNm, amount, state, applied_at, processed_at FROM exchange WHERE userNm = #{userNm} AND state = #{state,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler} ORDER BY applied_at DESC
